verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come on rejoice and let your heart sing Come on rejoice, give praise to the King. Come on rejoice and let your heart sing Come on rejoice, give praise to the King.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing hallelujah, He is the Lord of Lords, Sing hallelujah, He reigns forevermore.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing hallelujah, He is the Prince of Peace, Sing hallelujah, our joy will never cease.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah to our King !{/lang-eng}
